subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: There is only one hole in ToddPletcher's résumé as the nation's top trainer the past two years: He has saddled 19 horses in Triple Crown races, but not once has he visited the winner's circle.
snippet: There is only one hole in ToddPletcher's résumé as the nation's top trainer the past two years: He has saddled 19 horses in Triple Crown races, but not once has he visited the winner's circle.
